## Vectorisation {background-image="assets/images/cat.jpeg"}

````{webr-r echo=TRUE}
 
x=1:5

y1<-x*2

y2<-c()
for (i in seq_along(x)) {
  y2[i]<-x[i]*2
}

y1
y2
````
